segments.text: You know Ernie , it seems we both like the same artists .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we do . I think we have the same musical tastes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But if we're going to start a band , we have to be able to sing and dance . Can you do that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not a very good singer , but I'm a really great dancer ! I love hip hop dancing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! I'll sing , and you can dance in our band .
segments.speaker: S1
